args_help_help: Show this help message and exit.
args_help_start_ip: The IP address to bind to (defaults to localhost).
args_help_start_port: The port to bind to (defaults to 8080).
args_help_start_dbhost: The host address for the database (defaults to localhost).
args_help_start_dbport: The port for the database (defaults to 3306).
server_chooseprocess: Which process do you want to kill? (0 to exit)
